TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActivityTypeCodeDomSerializer extends System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.TypeCodeDomSerializer

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Serializes an to a new type.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
ActivityTypeCodeDomSerializer performs the same tasks as <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializer>, but if you use this class to serialize an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> it defines a new type.

Docs.param: The serialization manager to use for serialization.
Docs.summary: Returns the method where the statements used to serialize a member are stored.
Docs.returns: The used to emit all of the initialization code for the given member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The returned method is determined from a method key found in the user data associated with `typeDecl`. If there is no method key, GetInitializeMethod creates a new <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod>.

Docs.exception: , , or contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

An optional collection of members. Can be a null reference ( in Visual Basic) or an empty collection.
